title: WHY AM I BANNED
body: I've spent $2040 on this game and have literally done nothing except for maybe flame someone in the chat a couple hundred times over my 3 year period playing this sorry excuse for a game. I think for that amount of my sanity and money that you have taken away from me, that should add up to at least one "Get out of Jail Card". I would highly appreciate if I were un-banned so I can continue to destroy my brain cells while raging at some full AD Bard Jungle in ranked.

replies.body:
"literally done nothing except for maybe flame someone in the chat a couple hundred times over my 3 year period playing this sorry excuse for a game"

theres your reason. dont be mad at the game, be mad at yourself.

"I think for that amount of my sanity and money that you have taken away from me, that should add up to at least one "Get out of Jail Card"

no.
Yo this kid is an idiot bro like real shit dawg i swear to god lemme catch this guy in my game feeding tsk tsk tsk
i think u deserve to be unban im got you bro

I went ahead and pulled up your account history to see exactly what had been going on to get you banned like that. It does look like there might have been some fishy activity going on, which is why your account was locked. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and the agent will be able to go over everything with you in detail there.
